header.title: Premium Exam Coaching
header.subtitle: IBDP, A-Level / IAL and IGCSE — a structured system focused on marks, not guesswork.
chips: Recommended setup: iPad + Apple Pencil + GDC
Practice library: By-topic & by-level past papers

area1.title: What you get
items: Diagnostic-first planning: a week-by-week roadmap based on your exact bottlenecks.
Markscheme execution: how to write solutions that consistently score.
Deliberate practice: targeted sets, review, and error-proof routines.

area2.title: How I teach
items: Live Zoom lessons with interactive problem-solving and clean digital working.
Post-lesson homework and correction loops to eliminate recurring errors.
Lessons are primarily delivered in Cantonese/Mandarin; English delivery is available on request. Exam writing is trained in English.

stats: Edexcel IAL: F → A* (Math + Further Math)

coursesSection.title: Courses covered
coursesSection.intro: A structured by-topic question bank (2008–2025), organised by topic and year, is used across the following courses.

cta.label: Inquire about IBDP tutoring
cta.prefillText: Hi Winson Siu, I’m interested in IBDP Math tutoring. I am (name?) from (school?) in (year?) and need help with (AAHL / AASL / AIHL / AISL).

cta.label: Inquire about A-Level tutoring
cta.prefillText: Hi Winson Siu, I'm interested in A-Level Math tutoring. I am (name?) from (school?) in (year?) and need help with (Math / Further Math?).

cta.label: Inquire about IGCSE tutoring
cta.prefillText: Hi Winson Siu, I'm interested in IGCSE / IBMYP Math tutoring. I am (name?) from (school?) in (year?) and need help with (0606 / 0607 / 0580 / 4PM1 / 4PM0 / IBMYP).

ctaRibbon.heading: Limited 1-to-1 availability — enquire for placement and a recommended plan.
ctaRibbon.subheading: Premium, outcomes-driven coaching for IBDP, A-Level / IAL and IGCSE.
